name: Nitrovista v0.9.0
description:
A 5th gen style arcade racing game ported from the BGE to Godot. This game is a work in progress and it's open-source. ( MIT and CC BY 4.0 )

This game will be supported on more platforms in the future.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/zufmvka

The BGE version of this game is free along with its assets, but it wont receive updates. It's available on Game Jolt but since BGE was around before Blender 2.8, it's recommended that you use either UPBGE or Blender 2.79 to open global.bgd provided within its assets.
